name: Bubble Heroes Galaxy
description:
Take a ride into space in a new bubble shooter game - Bubble Heroes Galaxy!

Fly across the galaxy, pop & match colorful bubbles to clear the board and win amazing rewards! Use boosters & power-ups to complete the challenges, clear the colorful balls, and become the superhero that rescues the empire against the alien nemesis!

Bubble Heroes Galaxy is an extreme and fun bubble shooter puzzle game with hundreds of addictive levels, beautiful graphics & awesome boosts.

Compete against friends & family and see who can reach the highest score and get 3 stars with fewer moves on every level. Try out this cool, exciting matching game, improve your skills, and aim carefully to hit the target and make these bubbles pop!

SHOOT AND POP BUBBLES
Tap on the screen to shoot balls, aim for the colored bubbles, and use your skills to plan your moves so you can beat the target and finish awesome levels! Experience this special & popular puzzle game where you have to hit and pop the balls, beat all the challenges using amazing power-ups.

BUBBLES HEROES GALAXY AWESOME FEATURES:
• Totally free and super addictive, play as much as you want!
• Enjoy hundreds of thrilling levels filled with fun puzzles and challenges.
• Overcome all the special obstacles on your way and clear the board!
• Save the empire to complete the levels!
• Win powerful power-ups that will help you clear challenges and win levels before your moves are up!
• Create a line blast and smash the bubbles in this fun free app.
• Cool graphics and visual effects that make the entire gaming experience super fun.
• Smooth gameplay and cool animations.
• Completely free-to-play, hours of extreme fun guaranteed!

Fan of bubble puzzle games? Play this top game for FREE, reach the target, and enjoy hundreds of amazing levels filled with beautiful graphics and smooth gameplay. Join the superhero warriors and rescue the empire to complete levels to clear the board and win high scores. Play this galactic cool puzzle game anytime and anywhere - no internet connection or WiFi required!

ENDLESS FUN
- Show off your color matching skills and complete the different missions.
- Drag your finger to move the laser sight in the direction of the balls.
- Lift your finger to shoot bubbles.
- Aim & match 3 or more bubbles of the same color to pop the group.
- Pop all the bubbles and clear the board in this cool and relaxing game mode.
- Bubble Swap: you can change the color of your bubble with a tap.
- Compete with friends for the highest score!
- Reach the level target and solve the fun puzzle to advance.
- Boost your experience with awesome power-ups.
- Pop 7 bubbles in a row to unlock the FIREBALL that will burn every bubble on the way.
- Drop 10+ bubbles at once to get a massive BOMB.

PLAY NOW
Play fun shooter games without no internet connection or WiFi as much as you like and enjoy an unlimited bubble popping fun! Try out the best app and experience a simple yet super addictive puzzle game mode.
Try out this cool, exciting game, aim carefully to reach the target and make these balls pop!

Join an exciting bubble popping adventure! Use your skills to pop all the colorful balls by matching 3 colors. There is no life or time limit - you can connect and start any level over and not have to wait for lives, as they are unlimited!

Get ready for a new adventure! This addictive yet simple bubble shooter game offers some fun puzzles, challenging levels and amazing graphics and effects. Get it now for FREE and experience easy and fun gameplay. Shoot and match bubbles in this fun, addicting online bubble shooter game and meet your target so you can beat all the challenges and clear the board! Plan your moves, win cool power-ups, clear levels and win points.
